## tykctl cloud zones

fetch all the supported zones what deployment they supported.

```
tykctl cloud zones [flags]
```

### Examples

```
tykctl cloud zones
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help            help for zones
  -o, --output string   Format you want to use can be table,json (default "table")
```
